objections_concerns.objection_frequency_severity: low frequency, moderate severity (raised as 'sticking points' and 'snags' but in an inquiring manner)

communication_behavior.preferred_channel: email (for initial contact and scheduling), open to discussing details on Slack

deal_dynamics_risk_assessment.timeline_risk_indicators: vague/early stage (part of a broader overhaul, still mapping requirements)

deal_insights.key_objections: technical fit for multiple business units, ease of integration
deal_insights.decision_maker_status: key influencer/evaluator, part of a team responsible for a broader overhaul
deal_insights.urgency_level: moderate (part of an ongoing strategic initiative, not immediate)
